prompts.text: Analyze the American government. Identify one significant structural problem and propose a concrete solution. The solution should be specific, feasible, and clearly justified. (Maximum two paragraphs.)

Explain one major challenge in interpreting modern AI systems (e.g., deep neural networks) and propose a concrete research or engineering approach that would meaningfully improve interpretability in practice. Your proposal must be specific, feasible, and clearly justified. (Maximum two paragraphs.)

Identify one key psychological or structural barrier that prevents people from expanding their moral concern to include factory-farmed animals. Propose a concrete intervention that could realistically shift behavior at scale, and justify why it would work. (Maximum two paragraphs.)

Identify one major structural bottleneck that prevents effective climate action and propose a concrete, feasible intervention that targets this bottleneck. Explain why it would have outsized impact. (Maximum two paragraphs.)

Analyze the education system. Identify one structural problem that meaningfully harms learning or equity and propose a concrete, feasible solution. Explain the mechanism and why it would work. (Maximum two paragraphs.)
